trends: There have been 34 other sightings in Naples
There were no other sightings in Naples on or around May 5th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsI was at the beach last night taking photos of the sun setting. At about 30 minutes after the sun had completely set. I glanced Southward and then witnessed what looked like a blob or smear of several lights over the gulf of Mexico. These lights were the same color as a candle flame, perhaps just slightly more red. It looked as if the air itself was ionizing, or there was fire in the air where I was looking. I think the lights were flickering as a fire would from far away, hard to tell for sure. Lights together were about the size of a penny in hand outstretched. Shape of the lights together was like a backwards L with an apostrophe. It lasted about eight seconds then faded to nothing. I did have my camera with me, and no, unfortunately I didn't get a photo. To be honest, by the time I realized I was seeing something out of the ordinary, it was gone, and my camera was on a tripod aimed in the opposite direction.
Summary: Witnessed a group of lights over the gulf of Mexico, looked like fire or air ionizing..
